descriptionHtml:
[center]Taking requests in comments for zaney/fun/awesome spells you would like to see in the future, I get bored a lot and it helps me practise[/center]


I mean, the video basically says it all

[center][youtube]sthJ6PkbvSI[/youtube]

Also, seriously this stupid spell vid already trumped the views on my Discworld Alpha trailer lol, well since the spell will be part of it, watch something better people!
[youtube]aPzA_6RBWcg[/youtube][/center]

Comon People! Let's get the Horkalator on the front page where it belongs!! Next mod will change people into nude dibella statues then it will end up there

Specifics

Spell tome is located under Winterhold
The Horkalator turns the target into a horker for 20 seconds then back to their default race naked. SHould work with ANY custom race changers followers etc

I just got really bored..

Anyone can use anywhere, just credit me :P
It is a spell that is going to be in Discworld, just thought I'd release for all the Hexen fans
author: darren83
